pkgmetadata.longdescription: ***********numba-scipy***********.. image:: https://badges.gitter.im/numba/numba.svg :target: https://gitter.im/numba/numba?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge :alt: GitterNumba + SciPy = numba-scipy###########################``numba-scipy`` extends Numba to make it aware of SciPy. Numba is an opensource, NumPy-aware optimizing compiler for Python sponsored by Anaconda, Inc.It uses the LLVM compiler project to generate machine code from Python syntax.For more information about Numba, see the Numba homepage:http://numba.pydata.orgFor more information about numba-scipy see:https://numba-scipy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.htmlDependencies============* numba
